landing.title: The free, fun, and effective way to learn
landing.subtitle: Learn with AI-powered lessons, practice speaking with voice mode, and stay motivated with gamification.

gamified.title: Gamified Learning
gamified.description: Earn XP, maintain streaks, and compete on leaderboards. Learning has never been this fun!

voice.title: Voice Practice
voice.description: Practice speaking with AI-powered voice mode and get instant feedback on your pronunciation.

ai.title: AI Tutor
ai.description: Stuck on a question? Ask our AI tutor for personalized explanations and tips.

landing.levelsSubtitle: Our curriculum covers all CEFR levels from A1 to C2
landing.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of learners and start your Spanish journey today.
landing.footer: OpenLingo - Learn Spanish the fun way

dashboard.continueSubtitle: Pick up where you left off

lessons.title: Learn Spanish
lessons.subtitle: Choose a level to start learning

A1.name: Beginner
A1.description: Basic phrases and expressions for everyday situations

B1.name: Intermediate
B1.description: Main points on familiar matters regularly encountered

B2.name: Upper Intermediate
B2.description: Complex texts on both concrete and abstract topics

C1.name: Advanced
C1.description: Demanding texts and implicit meaning recognition

lesson.chooseLevelToStart: Choose a level to start learning
lesson.lessonsBeingPrepared: Lessons are being prepared. Check back soon!
lesson.unitsBeingPrepared: Units are being prepared for this level. Check back soon!

types.listening: Listen and type what you hear

outOfHearts.title: Out of Hearts
outOfHearts.message: You've run out of hearts. Wait for them to regenerate or practice to earn more.

leaderboard.title: Leaderboard
leaderboard.subtitle: See how you compare to other learners

apiKey.title: OpenAI API Key
apiKey.description: Enter your OpenAI API key to enable AI-powered features like personalized feedback and voice practice.
apiKey.getKey: Get an API key from OpenAI

lessons.title: Lesson Management
lessons.apiKeyRequiredDesc: You need to configure your OpenAI API key to use the AI lesson generator.
lessons.generateDesc: Use AI to automatically create a complete Spanish lesson with questions.
lessons.topicPlaceholder: e.g., Restaurant vocabulary, Job interview phrases
lessons.topicHint: Be specific about what vocabulary or phrases you want to teach.
lessons.generatingHint: This may take 30-60 seconds. Please don't close this page.
lessons.tip1: Choose a specific topic (e.g., 'hotel vocabulary' not just 'travel')
lessons.tip2: Match the difficulty to the CEFR level of the unit
lessons.tip3: Generated lessons are saved as drafts - review before publishing
lessons.tip4: You can edit questions after generation in the lesson editor

errors.notFoundMessage: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.
errors.unauthorizedMessage: You don't have permission to access this page.
errors.serverErrorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
